component.name: Map Picker
component.description: An interactive map-based location picker component that allows users to select geographical coordinates through map interaction, search functionality, and address input. Features location preview, zooming capabilities, and integration with geocoding services.

variants.name: Default
variants.description: Interactive map picker with drag-to-pan, location search, zoom controls, and real-time coordinate display. Features red marker pin, grid background, park and water layers for a complete location selection experience.
